titleStmt.title: Divine consolations against the fear of death in a dialogue between a minister and a tempted Christian : to which is added the Christians triumph over death : with divine contemplations, ejaculations and poems thereupon / written by John Gerhard.
titleStmt.author: Gerhard, Johann, 1582-1637.

notesStmt.note: "The Christians triumph over death" has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
